:QUESTIONS: 9, 14, 23, 42, 46, 55, 59, 65, 85, 93, 95, 100, 112, 142, 154, 160, 215, 235, 236, 252, 262, 264, 273, 292, 299, 300, 309, 322, 328, 351, 355, 356, 382, 385, 406, 407, 421, 433, 434, 473, 487, 500, 530, 534, 537, 551, 553, 563, 565, 574, 577, 578, 579, 598, 600, 606, 617, 627, 635, 638, 640, 644, 656, 660, 663, 665, 678, 684, 700, 702, 709, 712, 718, 721, 722, 765, 810, 815, 822, 829, 835, 838, 850, 866, 887, 898, 904, 938, 960, 976, 1022, 1049, 1050, 1056, 1068, 1072, 1081, 1098, 1100, 1109, 1113, 1116, 1125, 1155, 1165, 1166, 1168, 1170, 1182, 1207, 1214, 1217, 1242, 1302, 1311, 1319, 1335, 1355, 1360, 1366, 1375, 1376, 1382, 1386, 1408, 1411, 1429, 1434, 1473, 1489, 1502, 1503, 1515, 1518 :QUESTIONS:
It was first found in Wuhan City, Hubei Province, China. The first cases are linked to a live animal market but now COVID-19 is able to spread person-to-person.
